summary: The implementation covers the majority of the BuildRequest requirements including worker and employer authentication, profile management, job posting, QR code generation, job matching algorithm, job discovery interface, attendance tracking, rating system, payment tracking, and dashboards. However, several specific features and acceptance criteria are missing, particularly around admin dashboard metrics, job candidate review interface, worker replacement requests, and specific UI design constraints.

missing_requirements.requirement: Create admin dashboard with system-wide metrics including total workers registered, active employers count, total jobs posted, job fill rate percentage, average time to fill jobs, worker retention rate, and employer retention rate
missing_requirements.reason: No admin dashboard page or component exists in the frontend. The backend contains SystemMetrics type and getSystemMetrics function, but there is no admin-specific UI implementation to display these metrics. No route for admin dashboard exists in App.tsx.

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement employer job candidate review interface showing matched workers for each job posting with their reliability scores, skills, and distance, with ability to confirm worker slots and view auto-fill suggestions for bulk hiring
missing_requirements.reason: No dedicated candidate review interface exists. EmployerJobList.tsx shows job listings but does not display matched candidates, their reliability scores, skills, distance, or provide confirm/auto-fill functionality for worker selection.

missing_requirements.requirement: Build employer workforce management dashboard with ability to request worker replacement
missing_requirements.reason: EmployerDashboard.tsx shows metrics but does not include functionality to request worker replacement for unfilled slots. No UI controls or backend mutation for replacement requests are implemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: Design modern, professional, and minimal user interface using a clean color scheme that avoids blue and purple
missing_requirements.reason: The CSS color scheme in index.css extensively uses blue and purple hues. Primary colors include chart-1 with blue value 145 and chart-4 with purple value 195. ExperienceLevelBadge.tsx explicitly uses bg-blue-100 and bg-purple-100 classes, directly violating the constraint to avoid these colors.

missing_requirements.requirement: Build QR-based attendance tracking system where employers can scan worker QR codes for check-in and check-out
missing_requirements.reason: AttendanceScanner.tsx is truncated and the QR scanning functionality implementation is incomplete in the provided diff. Cannot verify if check-in/check-out properly records timestamps and job completion records as specified.

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement rating and reliability score system where employers can rate workers after job completion
missing_requirements.reason: Backend contains WorkerRating type and rating storage, but no frontend UI exists for employers to submit ratings after job completion. No rating submission form or interface is present in any employer-facing pages.

hallucinated_features.description: Social media links (Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Instagram) in footer
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not specify any social media integration or social media links. Layout.tsx includes social media icons and links that were not requested.
BuildRequest does not mention caffeine.ai attribution or any third-party service credits. Layout.tsx includes a promotional link to caffeine.ai with UTM tracking parameters.
BuildRequest does not specify dark mode support or theme switching functionality. index.css includes complete dark mode color palette with dark class that was not requested.
